seo.title: Garmin Edge® 1030 Plus | Bike GPS Computer
seo.ogDescription: The Edge® 1030 GPS bike computer helps you ride longer with features such as popularity-based routing, navigation alerts, and performance features.

overviewTab.title: Overview

mapsTab.title: Maps
mapsTab.content:
Maps for New Regions

Need maps for regions other than the ones that came on your device? See all maps that are compatible with your device.

Need a map update?

Update the maps that came with your device for the best navigation experience.

Check for Updates

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
Standard (Device Only)

  • Edge® 1030 Plus
  • Mounts (standard and flush out-front)
  • USB cable
  • Tether
  • Manuals

Bundle

  • Edge® 1030 Plus
  • HRM-Dual™
  • Cadence sensor
  • Speed sensor
  • Mounts (standard and) flush out-front)
  • USB cable
  • Tether
  • Manuals

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
General
Dimension58 x 114 x 19 mm
Weight124 g
Water rating IPX7
Touchscreen
Display TypeTransflective TFT
Display Size3.5" (88.9 mm) diagonal
Display Resolution282 x 470 pixels
Colour display
Battery typeRechargeable lithium-ion
Battery life24 hours
Battery save mode
In-ride power compatible (Power Mount and Garmin Charge battery pack)

Maps & Memory
Ability to add maps
Basemap
External memory storage32 GB internal memory
Waypoints/favorites/locations200
Navigation Routes100 courses
HistoryUp to 200 hours

Sensors
GPS
GLONASS
Galileo
Barometric altimeter
Accelerometer
Ambient light sensor
Magnetometer

Daily Smart Features
ConnectivityBluetooth®, ANT+®, Wi-Fi®
Connect IQ™ (downloadable watch faces, data fields, widgets and apps)
Smart Notifications
Text response/reject phone call with text (Android™ only)
Weather forecasts
VIRB® Remote
Smart trainer control
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Safety and Tracking Features
Assistance
LiveTrack
Group LiveTrack
Rider-to-rider messaging
Incident Detection
Find My Edge®
Bike alarm
Weather alerts
inReach® compatible

Activity Tracking Features
Calories Burned

Training, Planning and Analysis Features
Customisable screen(s)
Downloadable training plans
Daily workout suggestions
Auto Pause®
Interval training
Advanced workouts
Auto Lap®
Vo2 Max
Training status - Cycling
Training load - Cycling
Training load focus - Cycling
training effect
Recovery advisor
Virtual Partner
Race an Activity
Segments
Auto scroll
Physio TrueUp

Outdoor Recreation
ClimbPro Ascent Planner - Cycling

Cycling Features
Courses
Alerts (triggers alarm when you reach goals including time, distance, heart rate or calories)
FTP (Functional Threshold Power)
Cycle Map (routable cycling-specific street map)yes (multi-region)
MTB Dynamics
Compatible with Varia™ radar (rear-facing radar)
Compatible with Varia™ lights
Power meter compatible
On-device course creator
Trendline Popularity Routing - Cycling
Popularity heatmap
Cycling Dynamics compatible
Integrated TrailForks trail data

Connectivity
Edge® remote
Varia™ remote
ANT+™ electronic shifting
Shimano Di2 Synchro Shift integration
Extended display (allows a Garmin watch to share data screens on Edge®)
